text: If you are looking to hear more about the collaboration campfires, here is the link to the R podcast Episode 34: <https://r-podcast.org/034-collaborative-campfires/>

attachments.fallback: The R-Podcast: Episode 34: Enriching the Next Generation of R-Core Development
attachments.text: The R-Podcast has risen again! After sharing the story of my R adventures since the last episode, we focus on a very important initiative that could pave the way for the next generation of developers contributing to the future of R itself. I am joined by research software engineer Heather Turner and statistician Saranjeet Kaur Bhogal to share the story of how the new R Development Guide brings a new and accessible approach for learning how to contribute to the R project itself, along with their vision of the upcoming Collaborative Campfires to inspire and grow the community around this imporant effort.
attachments.title: Episode 34: Enriching the Next Generation of R-Core Development

elements.text: If you are looking to hear more about the collaboration campfires, here is the link to the R podcast Episode 34:
